1122790.name: Stone Story - OST
1122790.description:
This original soundtrack by Rafael Langoni Smith comes in an innovative post-chiptune style. Each song combines digital with an analog post-process, for a warm result that is as unique as, and an integral part of the Stone Story RPG experience.

This is a special rendition of the game's music, remixed and sequenced specifically for a better listening experience. Included are 28 .mp3 tracks plus bonus compositions that cannot be found in the game:

  • 1. Title Splash
  • 2. Main
  • 3. Rocky Plateau
  • 4. Deadwood Canyon
  • 5. Xyloalgia, Residue of Leuce
  • 6. Caves of Fear
  • 7. Bolesh, the Cunning
  • 8. Descent
  • 9. Mushroom Forest
  • 10. Mushroom Shoppe
  • 11. Angry Shroom
  • 12. Skull Game
  • 13. Haunted Halls
  • 14. Pallas, the Skinless
  • 15. Cross Deadwood River
  • 16. Boiling Mine
  • 17. Bronze Guardian
  • 18. Mine Ending + Climb
  • 19. Icy Ridge
  • 20. Hrímnir
  • 21. The Igloo
  • 22. Bridge Crossing
  • 23. Temple
  • 24. Nagaraja, Eater of the Torch
  • 25. Dysa Conversation
  • 26. Dysa Fight
  • 27. Epilogue
  • 28. Credits
  • B1. Main Alternative
  • B2. River Cross
  • B3. Electribe Experiment
  • B4. Rocky Plateau (Alternate)
  • B5. Bronze Guardian (Alternate)
  • B6. Icy Ridge (Alternate)
  • B7. Temple (Alternate)
  • B8. Nagaraja Prayer

Tracks appear alongside your Stone Story RPG installation, in a "OST" folder.
1122790.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 简体中文*, 繁体中文*, 法语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 俄语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 日语*, 韩语*, 土耳其语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
